fair: Treating people equally without favouritism or discrimination
beautiful: Pleasing the senses or mind aesthetically
happy: Feeling or showing pleasure or contentment
fast: Moving or capable of moving at high speed
small: Of a size that is less than normal or usual
guide: a person who shows the way to others
sweet: Having the pleasant taste characteristic of sugar or honey
dirty: Covered or marked with an unclean substance
loud: producing or capable of producing much noise
vast: of very great extent or quantity
clear: easy to perceive, understand, or interpret
awkward: hard to do or deal with
